name: Teams
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for creating new team created

Request payload must contain the following fields:

mentor_id: STRING
team_name: STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/teams

raw 
  {
    "mentor_id": "12",
    "team_name": "fast_five"
}

Response:

201 - Created 

  {"status":201,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:54.074Z","updated_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:54.074Z","status":"ACTIVE","team_id":28,"mentor_id":"12","team_name":"fast_five","created_by":40,"updated_by":40}]}
